content.detailedDescription:
heading home from work about 5:30pm on i-265 heading west. about two miles from where it connect with i-64,as i was approaching the interchange, saw a bright light hovering or moving slowly in the distance. although it was beginning to get dark, there was plenty of late, bright sunshine. the only clouds were much higher than the object. the object had a luminous trail behind it of about 20-50 feet. when it eventually passed thru some small clouds i could still see the light it generated.
 as i began heading north up i-64 the object moved toward edwardsville. i was driving 45-50 mph and it was parallel to me. it then slowed down and started moving towards georgetown. i took a back road to try and get under it for a better view. when i did so i could faintly see some kind of structure with the aura/glow coming from behind it. then, it started to fade as it approached georgetown proper.. in 20-30 seconds it gradually faded to nothing, while still moving. at the same time i heard sirens. i entered onto sr 62 and first responder vehicles were arriving from both directions and shut down the road. twice i saw a first responder run across the road, up an embankment and went into the area of an abandoned golf course. to me, they were looking for something. finally, my car and two before me were allowed to continue. what was surprising to me, was that the vehicles looked like fire trucks, but were move like large, all-terrain vehicles. also, when i passed this pass-thru area there was no auto accident scene, no sign of fire, nor injured parties. also no ambulance or stretchers. no police were there. this was just a few minutes. after the object slowly disappeared/faded out.
content.summary: Bright light first sighted about 2 miles away. appeared to be hovering or moving slowily.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of november 10, 2014, my other ground crew members and i had just finished towing a boeing 757 from the west side of san francisco international airport back to the terminal. as i was walking under the right main wing and had just passed the intake of the number two engine, walking towards the tip of the wing, i spotted my coworker. he asked me what time it was and i looked at my watch and in a british accent i said, “zero, zero, twenty-three.” 
he then had walked off toward my left as i continued toward the rear of the aircraft. ahead of me was terminal 2, which were filled with parked narrowbody aircraft. the air was cool outside and as i had been walking under the right wing (and just passing the trailing edge) i breathed out a few deep breaths and noticed my breath. i had thought to myself, “goodness, i guess the winter is coming quite quickly. it’s going to be cold at nights before i know it!” then after looking a little less than strait up, something caught my eye passing from right to left (about 50 – 70 degrees up). there were three faintly glowing lights  (fainter than the stars, but still bright enough to be noticed, and they had visible light auras around them, but no bigger than the lights themselves) moving in a wedge formation; the first light leading and the other two following, but all moving at the same rate. they were visible for about 3 – 4 seconds total. 
they seemed to have a downward curving trajectory. the first thing i said to myself was, “hey, it’s a new stealth, military fighter jet!” then while i was observing them, they joined up into what seemed like one light and i then said to myself, “no s**t! . . . it’s a ufo!” right after they had joined up, i quickly pulled out my iphone and attempted to set it to video mode, but i had lost sight of them by then. i then glanced at my watch and it said 00:26. my mouth then hung open wide and i walked about face towards my workers as they were removing chocks from the supertug that we had just used to tow one of our aircraft.
content.summary: Three dim glowing orbs fly fixed wedge formation parabolic flight path halfway across sky then join together

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i saw the orange globes in the sky
content.summary: Glowing orange globes traveling south in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was standing in my driveway, facing east, throwing the ball for my dogs after work.  glanced up at sky (clear, mostly cloudless night, stars visible but only faintly as was still not long after sunset) and saw object.  noticed it because i had never seen anything like it, and while there are routinely airplanes in the area, this did not resemble an airplane (and lights did not flash, nor was the object moving steadily in a path like an airplane, and they aren't generally in that direction - from my property, i often see the commercial airliners moving north of me from the east to the west where yvr is).  it did not appear to be a helicopter either though shape was difficult to determine as it was pulsing.  it mainly hovered, but appeared to be moving very slowly toward the north ... it looked like it was either enormous and really far away or kind of close, and not quite so enormous - it's difficult to say.  it looked to be about a 20 minute drive away in terms of distance (if i could have driven straight at it), but that kind of estimation is really not my strong suit (i should note that in that direction/area is the langley air field, but it sure didn't look like anything else that comes from that area!!).  watched it for about a minute or more, then looked away to throw the ball for my dog - looked back up and the object had vanished.  watched sky for another minute or so, saw no reappearance of object or any further activity.  glanced up periodically for the next 20 minutes or so, but saw nothing else unusual in the sky.  time was about 5:42pm when object disappeared when i took my eyes off it.  

how did i feel?  really creeped out, because i was making fun of the show "alien files unsealed" the night before, as i'm not a "believer."  but i really don't know what the object was.  it was not really an orb and not really a diamond shape - something in between.  it was so bright and pulsing, so difficult to determine exactly. i wish i'd thought to video with my iphone, but i didn't, sorry.
content.summary: Large red/orange pulsing, appeared far away but way larger than an airplane, no blinking lights - one solid mass of glowing light

content.detailedDescription:
On our way to waycross ga to spend the night, heading to cocoa beach fl. we were on state road 23 just north of the city of alma ga.

noticed strange cloud formations and asked my wife to take pictures of the clouds, see pictures. upon my review i noticed 2 white objects, my wife took 5 pictures and upon the review the objects did not appear to move.

i didnt and still so not know what the objects were.

at our distance from the 0bjects i noticed no movement

when i reviewed the pictures my wife and i were perplexed thinking maybe we accidentally took pictures of something strange. we then discussed to seek mufon opinions of the pictures.

we both thinked you might be interested to see the pictures
content.summary: Taking pictures of strange clouds then i noticed 2 white objects, took 5 pictures

content.detailedDescription: Driving home late from work and then saw these orbs couldn't take my eyes off the orbs. it was a dull copper color and moving around as i turned into my drive way the orb changed direction. before i knew it i drove into the rocks going up my driveway and messed my car up really bad. i got out of my car and the orb was gone.
content.summary: Homeward crash

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal night time here when a small kid at area observed  blinking multiple blue lights in the sky. when people around noticed it, all lights in the society were switched off to get a better view. these objects were high in number(possibly around 50-100). it was looking like a stars but flashing blue lights(turning on and off). slowly these moved from east to west and disappeared in around 15-20 minutes. people tried to capture them in a handy cam but quality was not good(though you can see those blinking lights in middle portion of video). still not sure what were these.
content.summary: It was group of blue lights hovering from east to west direction.

content.detailedDescription: Slow and low flying moving flickering lights unidentified objects. one by one they slowly just melted away and the more followed. counted about 35 plus.
content.summary: Numerous

content.detailedDescription:
I was aroused from my sleep at 4 am and looked out the front windows.
i noticed the light hovering behind my neighbors houses across the street
looking north. i observed it hover for about a minute, realizing what it might be, i grabbed my phone, threw on a coat and went outside on the steps to the house and tried taking pics. i managed to take these 2
before it shot out of sight in an instance silently as it was hovering.
the sighting lasted 3-4 minutes. this is the 2nd time observing an object 
glad i was able to take a picture this time
content.summary: Observed lighted object at 4am hover silently then leave in a blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
The first picture was in taipei, taiwan (i'm american) that i was on a trip with my significant other, sister and brother in law. did not see this at the time the photo was taken.

the taipei one we were at the national palace museum, right outside of the entrance and was simply enjoying the view. upon returning home found an unidentified flying object in picture. picture was taken september 30th, 2014. should be around 2 or 3 pm taipei time. 

second picture was just last week, december 20th, 2014 while i was in aruba with my fiancee. took that picture right before checking out of the hotel. wanted to capture the views one last time before we went back home. this was taken on the balcony of our hotel room. did not see that object in any other pictures before or after that snapshot. again, like in taipei, did not notice anything during the time i took the picture but only after taking the picture, while reviewing photos, i saw a tiny speck in that photo on my phone. i thought it was dirt or maybe a scratch on my phone's screen, when i could not clean that spot, i zoomed in to see something that looks like a ufo.

only notable feelings that was out of place was the day before, i woke up really early for no particular reason, could not sleep and went out on the balcony and while looking out at the ocean, had a strange urge like the ocean/beach was calling to me so i must go out to it. was so strange that i found it stupidly corny and even laughed out loud at the notion of "it's calling out to me."

it is worth mentioning because i absolutely hate the sun, heat and beach, only went to aruba because my significant other works in the hotel industry and had 5 nights free at the hotel. i did end up going to the beach by myself as my significant other was sick and asleep, early in the morning about 7/8 am. i am usually a vain person but had such a strong urge to get out there, ended up not even doing my usual meticulous routine of skincare and make up and just went to the beach to look at the views. nothing strange happened there but i guess it's worthy of mention since the urge to get out there, in a way where i feel i must do it so soon, disregarding my vanity and all, was unusual particularly for me, personally.

i'm sending these photos as i'm curious as to what mufon thinks they are and hopefully, my honest preference and hope is that they'd be disproved as ufos and are possibly other everyday objects.
content.summary: Ufos in pictures on 2 separate recent trips. please crop the two people out of taipei picture if photos are going to be made public.

content.detailedDescription: Saw two hovering lights in sky over detroit. one shot across sky leaving one light. then another light appeared.  all were brighter than airplane in area. second light that shot across the sky to the west. was gone. before i got my phone out. videos were from my cell phone, there was an airplane that flew over the light,  crom left to right. ghe airplane wasnt bright enough to show up on footage.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw two hovering lights in sky over detroit. one shot across sky leaving one light. then another light appeared.  all were brighter than airplane in area.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on haddon ave in pennsauken nj i noticed an unusual group of lights in the sky. my wife and daughter were also present. when i came to a stop light i decided to video as this was not normal and have never seen anything like it. when the light turned green i pulled into a gas station and exited the car but could only see 1 remaining objects use to tree obstruction . they were very low to the ground and looked exactly alike.
content.summary: While driving my i noticed the lights in the sky in an odd pattern. approximately 10 pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i were sitting in car, looked up and saw three large orange/red glowing lights about the size of an aspirin held out at arms length in the north sky about mid way up the windshield. i grew up in the georgetown/boulevard park area of seattle and that puts me in the flight path of 2 airports, seatac and boeing field. i have never seen anything move like these did nor have i seen anything with that size of lights. commercial, military, uav, blimp, fixed wing nor rotor craft will come close to what we saw. 

on youtube there is a video over phoenix from 2013 that shows exactly what we saw. also mufon case number 47459 seems to match pretty close as well and is in the same area. what was this?
content.summary: 3 orange/red lights that formed a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: Out on my deck having coffee when all of a sudden this bright blue object shaped like a giant bullet goes cruising by. it didn't make a sound, just went straight. i lost track of it as my view became obstructed by a neighbor's house. it then must have headed over the ocean. this object looked like it was out for an early morning cruise. it was the coolest thing i've ever seen.
content.summary: Like a fat bullet, bright saphire, appx 500' alt. no sound,appx100 mph.Appx.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work. i work outside. while working i had that feeling somebody was watching me. i was working by myself that night. some reason i looked over and saw a big bird sitting on a power line. right when i saw it its head turned around seeming like 360 degrees and looked dead at me.  i noticed it was a owl.Ive never seen a owl in the 8 yrs i worked there. i hurried and got my phone and snapped a photo.Then on new years night actually the 1st about 3 am i had a breakdown i guess id call it.I had just pulled up at my dads house.  anyhow i started thinking that my 2 yr old and my wife were taken away by aliens. i was yelling outside saying they got em they got em. i remember my parents coming out. i tried toget a assault rifle out of the house but my father wouldnt let me open the safe. mo mom blocked my car in parking behind me inso i got in my honda and started remming the chain link fence but couldnt break through. then my wife comes out of the house with my daughter and i started crying i was so happy and baffled. im surprised neighbors didnt call dpd they probably think im crazy!Maybe 2 or 3 wks later i saw that movie the 4th kind i rented from redbox. after i saw the owl in it i paused it got my phone went to my pics found the owl pic and noticed what i believe to be a ufo above the building. the owl can be seen flying away right after i took the pic. i wasnt sire what to think. the owl is flying off the black power line in the pic.
content.summary: Had a feeling someone or something was looking at me.

content.detailedDescription:
The time was 18:14 on the 15th of december. i had gone outside to wait for my girlfriend to return home from work. i noticed that it was a clear night and that a number of stars were visible. i noticed a light in the sky and presumed that it was a satellite from the speed and way that it was moving. it was star-like but a little bigger/brighter. it seemed to travel exactly how a satellite would travel from the south west for about a minute before it came to a complete halt at, approximately, 60 degrees. the light stayed in this position, close to a star that i used for reference, for roughly fifteen minutes. during this time i managed to take a number of photographs with my smartphone. 

the light then began moving again, this time quicker than before, in a different direction. i would expect a satellite to travel in a straight line i.E. from south west to north east, but the light started to move directly east from it's position above the star. i stepped out into the street from my driveway and watched as the light quickly moved towards the horizon. from observing other satellites i expected the light to fade into the night sky but i could still observe it for a further thirty seconds or so before i lost sight of it behind woodland on the horizon.

please see attached photographs.

[photo 1] at this point i had noticed the light and took a photo of the star that it was heading towards as reference.

[photo 2] the light becomes visible as it moves past the tree.

[photo 3] the light continues moving in the same direction.

[photo 4] the light stopped moving at this point and stayed in this position.

[photo 5] minutes later, the light still had not moved.

[photo 6] the light began to move again whilst changing direction.

[photo 7] a close up of the light as it began to move to the east.

[photo 8] another close up.

[photo 9] the last photograph i managed to take before the light sped away towards the horizon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fast moving star-like light

content.detailedDescription: We were on the beach and then someone shouthed "what is that"? it was flying in very strange triagular patterns moving over huge distances in just a blink of an eye ..It lasted about an hour and then it ust flew away in abnoral speed .. after that we fell asleep. i dont know what it was but no human could stand that kind of manevars.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was flying in triangular path wery wobbly and then just swushed to the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard of my land (about five acres) with my wife and friends (nine of us total).  we were roasting hot dogs and marshmallows.  after eating i began to gather wood in the area to build up the fire.  on one of my wood gathering sorties i stopped for a minute because i had to urinate.  as i was doing this i gazed at the dark sky.  i was standing about a hundred fifty feet away from the fire.  i was looking to the southeast when a glowing blue orb with a flat bottom appeared in the sky about 45 degrees above the horizon.  the orb was several times larger than venus but not near as bright.  it glowed a soft bluish color and looked translucent.  it remained stationary and glowed for several seconds then the light blinked off.  a few seconds later the light blinked on again fairly close to its previous location but a little further to the west and slightly higher in the sky.  it stayed on for only about one second and then blinked off again.  i did not see it again.  i immediately suspected it to be a ufo because it did not resemble anything with which i was familiar.  when i returned to my friends i asked them if anyone had seen the light.  they had not, as i suspected, because they were seated facing to the north.  i told them briefly what i saw but did not go into detail.  i did tell them that i thought i saw a ufo but did not make a big deal out of it because i didn't want to appear crazy and i knew they would not believe me anyway.  fyi, i was not drinking any alcohol, and rarely do.  because of the lack of any physical evidence or corroborating witness i was hesitant to make a report about this but decided that i should because it may have been observed by someone else.
content.summary: A glowing blue orb that stayed lit for a few seconds then reappeared for one more second.

content.detailedDescription: On december 20, 2014, from approximately 9-9:15 p.M., the day before the equinox, on indianapolis indiana's south-side, i witnessed an unprecedented (for me) mass-u.F.O. sighting. 20 (by my count) or more of alike tiara shaped u.F.O.S passed silently overhead from the east/southeast sky into the west/northwest sky in an apparent 'string of pearls' fashion. these inner-lit objects with graduated windows alluding to a pulsating orange-yellow glow appeared to be conciously guided through a variety of behaviors including variations in sequential quantity,speed, distance before deciding either to hover outright,ascend then hover, some simply disappearing with cloud subterfuge, and many deciding to pass directly overhead, after hovering, with absolutely no sound and no vapor trails. i have seen this before, but never as profusely as this time!  also, yet again, i've become aware of at least one black helicopter, dimly flanked toward the rear by one small light, perimeter pacing the area, giving the objects a w_i_d_e berth. i had been outside tending to a feral cat colony and the un-characteristic behavior of the known colony members, including uncharacteristic shrieking, crying,  and absolutely hyper scurrying drew my attention and fear(for the cats), to our questionable 'guests'. the negative adrenaline reaction blends with the sense of utter astonishment.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Unprecedented mass-ufo sighting prior to equinox.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and took these pictures because it was beautiful and looked back at my pictures and saw something strange.
content.summary: I was driving and took these pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was outside for a moment talking to a friend when we noticed something in the sky far off into the horizon. it appeared to be a flock of ducks (triangle formation) but moved over us very quickly. we both saw it. once it got above us we could see its size. the night was clear so we noticed the stars getting blocked out. no lights and no sound and was very large. it just flew off as quick as it got there and dissappeared into the night. i was not one to believe these things exist but now i know.
content.summary: Looked like a black shadow very large very fast

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of 2002, my ex-wife, myself and 3 friends were overnight fishing at lake hemet in hemet,ca. at approximately 12:00 am we noticed a light to the north east of our location. the light was white towards the center, but was several shades of pink, purple and violet towards the outside of the light. it was at least a few thousand feet from our location. it didn't appear to be moving, but was well above the nearby hills. we, at first, guessed it was either a helicopter or perhaps even a slow moving plane coming directly towards us, as it didn't appear to be moving left or right, but did appear to get brighter and larger. 

after several minutes we saw 2 or 3 more similar lights join the first one. they appeared to have come from either the ground below or perhaps a lower elevation of flight that was being obscured by trees. soon all the lights appeared to be whizzing around each other at amazing, breakneck speeds. they were all maneuvering in ways i had never seen before. sudden stops, accelerations & 90° sudden turns. they appeared to be moving closer, but we were unsure.

within a matter of minutes we noticed the "crafts" seemed to suddenly be closer. they were nearly overhead by this point. soon we realized that these weren't just "lights", as they had an oval shape and appeared to have a distinct outline. we were unable to make out any specific details, as the bright light obscured our vision. we were all nearly frozen with fer and excitement. there were about two dozen other people around this small lake. several of them began shouting, asking us if we could see what they were seeing. we told them "yes" and suggested they quiet down. we didn't want to scare away the craft or let it know our exact location, as we were all afraid.

soon, one of the people across this small lake used a small spotlight in an attempt to better see the "crafts". as soon as the light shone towards them, they suddenly began ascending, descending and making all different types of maneuvers. everyone screamed and ran to their vehicles and tents, in an attempt to hide from the "crafts".

after only a few moments the craft all began ascending at lightning speed towards the sky above. it was frightening, but also exzilerating and beautiful! due to the frightful nature of the encounter, our group of 5, as well as a few of the other groups at the lake, all packed our things and left in a hurry. unsure of the possibility of a return, we were unable to sleep the rest of that night. the following morning we heard from several friends and family, who lived near the lake, with reports of ufo's in the area that night. out of fear for government reprisals, we all decided not to speak of the event openly ever again. 

now, after all these years, i have decided that it is time to come forward and tell my story. i know that my story is not nearly as detailed or invasive as many other stories. however, it is my hope that perhaps stories like mine can better help the mufon community in their efforts to put the puzzle of these phenomenon together and form a clearer picture. thank you for enabling me to share my story.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several fast moving lighted craft

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home from the store when we noticed a strange light above the north ridge of pikes peak. we were driving at the time, headed west on woodmen rd, then west on rockrimmon, then west on vindicator.  we witnessed what i thought was a light that had a horseshoe shape, my wife thought it was an object emitting light but the shape was consistent for both of us. my wife pulled out her cell phone and snapped two pictures of the light/object.  the pictures are obviously not as detailed as what we saw but did offer a picture that shows a light with a sense of direction. the photos were both taken at 4:48pm on the 16th of december, with an iphone 5s.  we noticed the object because it was extremely bright at dusk. the brightness is what brought our attention to it. i had no clue what the object might have been when i first laid eyes it but my wife thought it was some type of rocket. the light/object was just above the north ridge of pikes peak, it was a constant yellow-orange-reddish light that was unwavering in brightness.  it appeared as a horseshoe shape with the ends of the shoe pointed down and turned at an angle so you could see the opening at the bottom and the arch at the top. it seemed to move slowly in a southern direction then hover.  the sighting lasted a whole of 2 minutes. then the object simply disappeared with no trace left. we both felt hearts race and a feeling of excitement but almost doubt as well.  my wife looked for any explanation that it could be on the internet and found nothing.  we researched more into this and that's when we found mufon.
content.summary: Lighted object over the mountains in colorado springs, appeared to be a horseshoe shape. had a very slow movement south and then hovered, then disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was thursday night and my neighbor "lynx" messaged that it was a clear night and asked if i wanted to do another ufo "stakeout." i really didn't want to, but with holiday travel just around the corner it might've been the last night for "ufo hunting" for the year, plus "lynx" did have pretty good intuition as to when we would see something out there (that sometimes i wondered if he was behind all of it.) anyways, i agreed and we went. the chosen location was close by in the wildlife refuge next to town where there is a boardwalk leading into a swamp. that night i was feeling pretty brave so we decided to venture past our normal limits and head out towards the dock. it was a little after 8 pm.

we arrived to our stake out destination for the evening, a dock along the boardwalk that jutted out over the river. while lynx usually looked for the lights, i would keep my eye out for the crafts that were nearly invisible, flying silently at low altitude which i had seen twice before. within 15 minutes, lynx said, "what's that?" just over to the north, behind the tree line and between us and the town there were two orangish/red orbs flying south.  immediately, i tapped record on my iphone. the time was 8:25. we knew that was it, the same type of ufo that we had chased down main st. in hopes to capture an image. maybe this time i would actually get some video. we watched the ufo fly south, circle back around and fly south again to then disappear. i checked my phone and unfortunately all that was recorded was me telling lynx to not let any light shine from his phone. we sat waiting for only a few minutes when the craft reappeared from the southeast, it looked like it was coming right towards us. just as it had gotten over the refuge it turned north. we could clearly tell that it was a perfect triangle, black with large orangish/red lights in each corner. it circled around several times, and then hovered below the tree line between us and the town. the space between the corners of the triangle expanded as the altitude of the craft decreased. i was really starting to freak out not only because it was so close to us, but because between safety and where we were was a swamp and a hovering ufo. the craft circled back around. why was it so interested in the refuge? my dog was starting to act frightened as if he knew something was up, which was so strange and out of character for my happy-go-lucky dog.  finally, the craft disappeared off towards the northeast. lynx made us wait for another few minutes to make sure it was gone. we did not want to be stuck halfway to town stuck in the swamp with it hovering over our heads. my heart raced as we made it back to the safety of the town lights. we were both in awe as we had just experienced forty minutes of a close encounter of the unknown kind. once again we had witnessed a craft move so unnaturally and silently across our night sky that the only words to describe this phenomenon was that we had just witnessed another ufo.

there was the beginning of the years biggest meteor shower just starting that night, but what was odd is that one time it looked like objects were shot out from the craft that were very large and bright balls of light. they were a lot brighter than any of the meteors we observed during the 4 day meteor shower, but i am not for sure if it did indeed come from the craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed black triangle for 40 minutes flying, hovering, descending and ascending, while circling the area.

content.detailedDescription:
Invisible craft # 2
three weeks after the first sighting of a nearly invisible craft, on nov. 19, 2014 at around 9 pm, i was taking my dog out to the bathroom in our backyard. standing on my back deck, i looked up towards the sky and noticed the same type of craft that i had seen on the boardwalk, flying directly overhead, however this craft had a very different shape and movement. once again, the craft was black with grayish/white circles underneath, however this craft was shaped like a chevron, not two triangles put together, was smaller, and had fewer circles at 3-4 circles. the chevron shaped craft flew directly overhead and i was able to  keep it into view for about 10 seconds until it disappeared in the light pollution from the street lights. the strangest characteristic about this craft more than any other ufo i have seen since first spotting them a few months ago, is that the back portion of the craft moved from left to right, as if it were a tail propelling it forward. it was as if you were looking into a telescope and spotting a squirming thing move across your slide, but what what so strange is what i observed in the sky was mechanical and obviously not something biological. strange i know, but again these encounters were both like nothing i had never seen before.  

this is the second sighting on this type of craft.
content.summary: Nearly invisible black chevron shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
Just after my first ufo sighting 3 months ago in september, my ufo hunting partner "lynx" started talking about seeing not just the lights, but an actual physical craft on several different occasions. i thought that perhaps his imagination had gotten the best of him. i certainly did not want to believe that these crafts were in fact flying over my house after hearing that he'd spotted one once doing just so. ha. the following is a description of two different ufo sightings that appeared to be nearly invisible.


invisible craft # 1
on oct. 27, 2014, "lynx" and i decided to go ufo "hunting" after previously spotting strange unidentified flying objects on several occasions. we live in a small town where you have to sort of get creative in finding entertainment. i'm an avid star gazer and photographer, so naturally "ufo hunting" provides an excuse to get out under the night sky and maybe capture a few photos of some constellations. that night at around 8:30 pm we arrived to our ufo scouting spot for the evening where our town's boardwalk enters the wildlife refuge. while literally staring off into space looking for the strange orbs of orangish/red lights that i had witnessed before, i noticed something moving across the sky. i looked closer and this nearly invisible, black ufo flew across the milky way, directly overhead. i should mention that the milky way is very visible here in columbia due to the little light pollution and if it weren't for just how bright the stars and milky way are here, i wouldn't have noticed it. the craft was shaped like two "perfect triangles" (geometry term) put together at one of the corners of each. (like in the diagram above, however this craft was a bit more elongated than depicted.) the craft was completely silent and in no way appeared to be aerodynamic. as you can see in the diagram, both the front and back of the craft were completely flat.  there were grayish/white circles underneath the black craft and was in view long enough, to be able to count the number of circles. perhaps they were lights that were not illuminated. the craft was in view for about 15 seconds until it disappeared passed the trees next to us.


this was the first of two of these types of crafts i have seen. i am reporting the other one as well.
content.summary: Invisible black craft with circles underneath

content.detailedDescription:
Vertical triangle flying towards town

the following night after observing my first ufo where the physical craft could be seen, my family invited me over to his family's place. i was inside chatting with his family, when my friend ran inside and shouted "quick! come out here!" i rushed out and immediately spotted a huge triangle shaped craft that was flying vertically and perpendicular to the ground, not horizontally. this craft was so large and moving so slow along the edge of the swamp/refuge, and it passed directly over where we were ufo hunting on the boardwalk the night before. again, it was silent and flying very close to the ground at a low altitude. how the heck can a craft so large do that?! the sides/edges of the triangular craft were lit up with orangish/red lights and it had a larger orangish/red light in the very center of the triangle. some of the lights were blinking while others were solid. as it approached the town it turned parallel with the length of the town and its lights started to turn off one by one. my friend and i literally ran down main st. trying to get a photograph of it with our cell phones. he said that he saw the craft flying horizontally towards town and then as it came closer it changed from flying horizontally to flying vertically, so that by the time i got outside i could see the underside of the craft. we watched the craft for a total of about 5 minutes until we could no longer see it after it had turned all of its light off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Vertical black triangle flying towards town, changes direction

content.detailedDescription:
earlier this week on tuesday, dec. 16th, 2014, lynx and i went out ufo hunting in our town one last night for the remainder of the year. the two ufo hunting outings that were within the past week were successful as there has been a lot of strange ufo activity going on right now. on friday, december 12, for 40 minutes in the swamp/refuge that borders town, we watched a black triangle with orangish/red lights hovering and flying around. the following night on saturday, december 13, for 5 minutes and with two other witnesses we watched a pair of orangish/red orbs off in the distance just past the swamp/refuge. as soon as we got to the observation hotspot, i noticed a pair of orangish/red orbs flying above the trees through the swamp forest. i just wanted to stay there for a minute and observe it to see what it did, not go chasing after it. we walked out on the boardwalk and i immediately noticed just on the other side of the river two sets of orangish/red orbs were flying from the north to the south. i then look over to my left again to see if i could still spot the one pair of orbs through the trees and i could no longer see it. again i just wanted to wait and watch from there to see what would happen, but my friend was leaving me behind to head into the swamp. i was starting to get upset and even more scared. as soon as i stepped into the tree coverage of the swamp i saw several orangish/red orbs flying and hovering around above the tree line and i was unable to keep my eye on them the entire time. my friend was telling me to hurry so that we can get to our usual filming spot to set up the camera equipment. i immediately call my best friend on the phone just to keep me in the moment and so that he would be there in case anything happened. we finally make it out to the filming spot where we have a good view, i still have my friend on my phone, my heart is racing, i'm shaking and i look behind me and above the tree line of the swamp are so many orangish/red orbs flying and hovering around that i was unable to count and watch them all at once. on the other side of me was the river and where the two sets of orbs were located when we first started out. because i was trying to keep my eye on the many orbs above the swamp that were a whole lot closer, i was unable to tell if the others were still there. so i'm trying to set up my tripod and camera to get this on video and i still have my friend on the phone talking to him. the orbs then started flying towards us and over the river. when the orbs were the closest to us as they were flying over the river, with still being on the phone with my friend, my phone went to complete static and then my call was dropped. i didn't put this together until later, but while a dropped call can happen occasionally if one is in a bad spot, what was so strange was the correlation between the static sound just before the dropped call as the ufo was flying nearly overhead. i didn't try to use my phone until much later that night, but when the call dropped with that static sound that it did, it caught me off guard.

tuesday night is the 5th time that we have seen ufo activity over the swamp/refuge bordering town and it was definitely the scariest ufo hunting night because there was so much orb activity all around us. again, these orbs were flying very-very low just above the tree tops, large, silent and would hover. i have spotted the black triangles and the orangish/red orbs now enough times that i have a pretty good idea of some of their characteristics, which include; change from orangish/red color to white,  a light/orb may blink while another or others stay solid, tend to turn lights off one by one; sometimes you will see three lights of the triangle and can see a very distinct triangular shape and then the craft will make the slightest move and you'll only be able to observe two lights. there doesn't seem to be any rhyme or reason to the way the lights are changing from orangish/red to white, three (or many) to two to one, and solid to blinking. in fact, knowing this is one of the best ways to spot a ufo and then of course being in an area that has a lot of activity like where we are. i just want to add on here, that i haven't been interested in this stuff until i recently started spotting these strange things in the sky, just for the record.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs hovering and flying all around. cell phone called went static and dropped.

content.detailedDescription: On friday december 19, 2014 at approximately 10:30pm, i was on my back porch looking in a southwest direction when i noticed 2 orange-red lights coming over the rocky mountains. as they were making no sound i was kind of puzzled, i asked my granddaughter to come check it out when several more came over the mountains. (8 total) i then asked my granddaughter to get her aunt, her aunts boyfriend and my husband. we all watched these lights for about 1 minute as they traveled north. they all faded out one by one. has anyone else reported these strange lights over lakewood colorado?
content.summary: Strange lights over the rocky mountains-seen from lakewood, colorado

content.detailedDescription: I was going through some photo's i took from my trip to my hometown last year. just like all other times i visit chicago the skyline and buildings makes for good pics. i never saw anything until i uploaded photos from a cll phone that i was using at the time! this photo was taken as i was driving toward the eisenhower expressway!
content.summary: Could not be seen with the naked eye..But is shown quite clearly on picture!
